title: The problem with League right now is Hyper-carries are too good in the early game.
body:
{{champion:96}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:45}} 


Are all supposed to be great late game right? Problem is these champs powerspike too early..

Example kogmaw gets his first 2 items and anyone is melted..

Jinx Goes hurricane--> IE boom shes slaughtering people. That ult buff was completely unneccessary and just pushed it over the edge.

Veigars early-mid game DAMAGE is just too high in general. 

Now when late game comes its practically like these champs have scaled soo hard that killing them is virtually impossible and theres no amount of resistences that can withstand.

Also fervor is too good on A.speed reliant champs

(jinx / kog)

While thunderlords is just unnecessary damage for already 100-0 champs

replies.body: Kog'Maw and good early game don't match up

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-15T23:23:31.416+0000)
>
> Kog'Maw and good early game don't match up

Its not **supposed** to match up but once kog hits 2 items he hit his power spike
2 items is not early game. Unless you've been feeding harder than the Salvation Army, he won't hit 2 items till about 20 mins, which is by no means early

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Rice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T23:35:22.832+0000)
>
> 2 items is not early game. Unless you've been feeding harder than the Salvation Army, he won't hit 2 items till about 20 mins, which is by no means early

Up to 20 minutes is early. 20-30 is mid, 30+ is late.


The Rift Herald was said to be put as an early game objective in the rioter post.

It leaves after 19:50 So 0-20 is early game..

PFFFFFFFFFFT.

Calling Kog's early good.
By the time Jinx has IE and Runaan's, it's not early. Her actual early is rough.
Anivia's not a hypercarry in the first place.
Veigar's early is generally somewhat safe if they're intelligent, but it's not good by any means.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-15T23:32:24.904+0000)
>
> PFFFFFFFFFFT.
> 
> Calling Kog's early good.
> By the time Jinx has IE and Runaan's, it's not early. Her actual early is rough.
> Anivia's not a hypercarry in the first place.
> Veigar's early is generally somewhat safe if they're intelligent, but it's not good by any means.

ok
anivia is not a late game champion

> [{quoted}](name=colesy94,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-16T00:05:12.848+0000)
>

what
Is understanding the basic English he used difficult?

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-16T00:17:05.683+0000)
>
> Is understanding the basic English he used difficult?

Neptune i dont know if you know this, But i said ''ok'' to your other post because i do not wish to argue nor engage in any form of conversation with you.

I understand this is the public boards but please respect my wish to not conversate with you. You said what you have to say so just leave.
Okay, then don't make a public post crying about champions?

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ciiEYIdb,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-16T00:30:03.204+0000)
>
> Okay, then don't make a public post crying about champions?

Was not crying, was to discuss some problems with these 4 champs ( 3 are getting nerfed in the next pbe cycle according to Meddler ) 

So wanted to discuss some of the problems they have.

''Dont make a public post crying about champions''

This is why i do not like talking with you.
But your points aren't even correct in the first place.
That sentence offended my brain... (Horribly written)
tell me what about her kit makes her a lategame champion
i agree, all these champions should be nerfed until they are unviable
